input.sentences: my parents showed me some old photos of them last week .
they had to look through their entire office to find them .
when the power went out they has to use candles .
when we found them we decided to upload them online .
i had a great time with them .
output.sentences: Our visit with our parents started with these photos.
They turned this room entirely into an office.
We lost power during the visit so we used candles.
We uploaded and found things online that we needed.
The time with the parents was so much fun.
